_comment_purpose: Configuration for NASDAQ100 oracle lows-highs delay studies
_comment_usage: Specify date range, parameter sweeps, and output toggles

study_metadata.name: nasdaq100_oracle_delay_baseline
study_metadata.description: Baseline study with standard parameter grid

data_selection._comment: Date range for study (YYYY-MM-DD format). Will be clipped to available HDF5 data.
data_selection._comment_tradability: Inferred from data quality (NaNs, infill detection) by date

oracle_parameters._comment_extrema_windows: Centered window half-widths (days) for low/high detection
oracle_parameters._comment_explanation: Window of 25 means [date-25, date+25] total 51-day centered window

delay_parameters._comment_days_delay: Information delay (days). 0 = perfect oracle, >0 = delayed signal
delay_parameters._comment_explanation: Delay of 5 means signal at date j uses information from j-5

portfolio_parameters._comment_top_n: Number of top-ranked stocks to hold
portfolio_parameters._comment_rebalance: Monthly aligns with PyTAAA for comparability
portfolio_parameters._comment_costs: Set to false for baseline; enable for sensitivity analysis

signal_generation._comment_edges: Drop edge dates where centered window incomplete

ranking_method._comment_explanation: Rank by realized monthly return (unknowable metric)
ranking_method._comment_delay: If true, ranking availability shifted by days_delay

output_control._comment_metadata: Set true to save low/high detection tables for debugging
